The `Teams` dataset has \_*3015*\_ observations and \_*48*\_ variables.

### Exercise 2

```{r}
mets <- Teams  %>% 
  dplyr::filter(teamID == "NYM")
my_mets <- mets %>% 
  dplyr::filter(yearID %in% 2004:2012) %>%
  dplyr::select(yearID,G,W,L)
my_mets 
```
